item.title: [Java]Primitive type and Reference type
item.description: Primitive type JAVA provides 8 kinds of Primitive type There is no null value. Defult value is already inserted. actual value will saved in Stack memory. String is object. Not primitive type. Data Type Allocated Memory Defult Value Range of Data Range of Data in Number boolean 1 byte false true, false byte 1 byte 0 -127 ~ 128 $-2^{7}$~ $(2^{7}-1)$ short 2 byte 0 -32,768 ~ 32,767 $-2^{15}$~ $(2^{15}-1)$ int 4 byte 0 -2,147,483,648 ~ 2,147,483,647 $-2^{31}$~ $(2^{31}-1)$ long 8 byte 0L -9,223,372,036,854,775,808 ~ 9,223,372,036,854,775,807 $-2^{63}$~ $(2^{63}-1)$ float 4 byte 0.
